comments.message:
To MCD Management,

Please limit the number of doll can be purchase by the customer, Eg maximum of 2 or 3.

Or

Let customer to reserve the meal to other low income family.

BECAUSE!! 

I SAW A GUY BUY TEN SET MEAL FOR TEN KITTY DOLL AND THROW ALL THE MEAL INTO BIN!!! & I BELIEVE THERE IS SAME THING HAPPEN TOO!!!

Don't waste food!

What i did :
I don't drink coffee or tea! So I ask the lady to reserve it, she said can't do that. But she approach to exchange other drink without extra charge! She is a nice staff although her is elder.

Thank & Regards.
Yes, MCD should limit the purchase by individual customer, if not, those queing behind or people with disability will be deprived of the promotion.

I also agree, there shud b a limitation on the maximum sets allowed to purchase, this is very unfair for those who queue v long behind sweating when they see those at the front bought 6 sets or more..., although i know there is huge resale value now, this is rather exploit for those who really sincere to get just 1 for their child n eed pay someone S$20-S$30 just for a kitty.
U no biz like dat for sure too high your price! :p
I rather queue early n get early too !

SO WHAT IS HAPPENING?!?!?!? MACDONALD!!???!?
 STOP SUCH PROMOTION IF YOU ARE NOT HONEST WITH YOUR MARKETING!!!!!!

 RULES ALL OVER BUT YOUR OWN STAFF BREAKING THEM???

 Well done...your staffs has sold a couple of the Hello Kitty - Singing Bone to their friends/"aunties" at the outlet beside Admiralty MRT Station just afew minutes ago. A uncle asked if the singing bone is on sale & got the reply of it's available from midnight onwards. So what's the actual selling time of the Hello Kitties & does being a friend or associate of a McDonald's staff or being a staff gets priority on buying it?. All you can reply is apology & whatsoever.
You want people to participate. Can! Make people join to get kitties. :)

9.post_text:
Dear Customers,

Thank you all once again for your support of our Hello Kitty Fairy Tale promotion! Our intention is for the Hello Kitty plushies to be enjoyed by as many customers and Hello Kitty fans as possible, and we do not encourage customers to purchase them for resale. We also  urge all our fans to exercise due care when sharing their personal contact details online, and to be cautious when making arrangements with strangers. We seek your kind understanding that we will be removing posts that advertise the sale and trade of Hello Kitty plushies from this page. Thank you.

15.post_text: Hi everyone! We have been alerted to a page on Facebook that claims to be a feedback page for McDonald’s Singapore. The page is not administered by McDonald’s, and we have sought assistance from Facebook to prevent users from being misled. Please continue to share your comments and private messages with us on this official McDonald’s Singapore page here, thank you!

16.post_text:
Hi everyone! The popularity of our McDonald’s Hello Kitty Fairy Tales promotion has exceeded our expectations, and we are aware that some of you have experienced delays when using our McDelivery service. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused and would like to assure you that our teams are working very hard to minimise any disruptions. For those of you who have already left messages on our Facebook wall, our Customer Care staff will be getting in touch with you as soon as possible.

We take our service standards very seriously and customers who have encountered issues can contact us at ops@sg.mcd.com or send us a private message with your contact details. 

Thank you for your support!

17.post_text:
Coupons with up to 50% savings! Visit www.mcdgoplay.com for more exciting holiday offers!

Redeem by printing or showing this offer on your mobile phone to staff at any McDonald’s counter. 
Valid in Singapore from 30 May till 30 June 2013.
Coupon cannot be used with any other offers. One redemption per transaction. 
All featured items are as indicated, and are non-exchangeable, while stocks last.
Not valid via McDelivery™, at iFly Singapore and institutional stores.

24.post_text: If you’re cheerful and have a passion for delighting customers, we want you! Head down to our recruitment drive at JTC Corporation on 30 May from 2.30-4.30pm. You could become a part of our McFamily! :) This recruitment drive is organised by Community Development Councils (CDC).
